mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Thanksgiving - 1961", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Style Series: The Square Dance Balance", "Hot Potato: Why a Club Outfit?", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "The Big Brass Band", "Ladies on the Square: Needle Points for Square Dance Seamstresses", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "Handbook: American Square Dancing", "Caller of the Month: Chuck Goodman", "Paging the Roundancers: Les and Mildred Roberts", "Americana: Kansas Boys", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", and "Experimental Lab: Roll Back".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
